sentence: You could easily never leave the hotel while in Vegas as it offers lots of great dining and entertainment options without leaving the property
All of the other hotels are open floor plan and have a natural setting for the casino whereas the Cosmo is narrow and just feels odd
it is walking distance to all the casinos without the smoke

but Hotel staff were unimpressive would nt class them as 5 star food and bar options not great our room was well equiped but we were nt allowed to use the fridge because of charges to mini bar was going to cost 25 to remove mini bar and casino poor went elsewhere for gambling
The casino at the Cosmo is not the best does not really compare the big ones such as the Belagio and Caesars but it is there if you have not had enough gambling whilst out and about exploring
As usual only issue is smoke in the casino but expected in Las VegasWould definitely stay here again
After we ate we gamble but of course just like ALL the casinos in Vegas what money you gamble with in Vegas will stay so only take what you can afford to lose
Casino lobby elevators and hallways smell like farts but once you entered your room either you no longer noticed it or the room smelled extra fresh
Not a very impressive casino and practically no shopping
Casino is above average IMO and service usually good
a vast choice of restaurants shops and I am sure the Casino is great
I was desapointed about the room and the casino
I like the lights food and nightlife and on this trip to Vegas I put a premium on having a great view
Good for shopping gambling nightlife
Classy and modern with top flight night clubs tram connects to other hotels and casinos
Enjoyed the time spent at the casino
Urban feel hotel perfectly placed on the LV Strip amazing bars restaurants and of course casino
The Cosmopolitans 100 sq ft 930 m2 casino features views of the Las Vegas Strip
Staff was friendly at the front desk and in the casino
Beautiful relatively new clean popular casino on the strip
